definition.name: Create or Update Project Card
definition.description: A GitHub action to create or update a project card
definition.author: peter-evans

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: GITHUB_TOKEN or a repo scoped PAT

inputs.name: project-location
inputs.description: The location of the project. Either a repository, organization, or user.

inputs.name: project-number
inputs.description: The number of the project. Semi-required. Either `project-number` OR `project-name` must be supplied.

inputs.name: project-name
inputs.description: The name of the project. Semi-required. Either `project-number` OR `project-name` must be supplied. Note that a project's name is not unique. The action will use the first matching project found.

inputs.name: column-name
inputs.description: The name of the column to add a card to, or move an existing card to.

inputs.name: repository
inputs.description: The GitHub repository containing the issue or pull request.

inputs.name: issue-number
inputs.description: The issue or pull request number to associate with the card.

latest_release.name: Create or Update Project Card v3.0.0
